name: d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc
description: Another Discord game rpc, but it's weird

d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.clientID.title: Discord Game RPC ID
d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.clientID.description: If you want to change the game you should edit this

d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.details.idling.title: Idling
d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.details.idling.markdownDescription:
Sets detail text when you are sleeping.

 - `{workspace}`: Workspace name (if the workspace is undefined this will be changed to blank)

d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.details.editing.title: Editing
d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.details.editing.markdownDescription:
Sets detail text when you are doing a hard work.

 - `{lang}`: Language
 - `{filename}`: Filename
 - `{dirname}`: Directory name that has currently editing file
 - `{fulldirpath}`: Full file path(from your root directory)
 - `{workspace[:alternativeVar]}`: Workspace name (if alternative var is set it will be used if original var is not available)
 - `{filesize}`: File size in human readable text(ex: 1.44 MB, 4.20 KB)
 - `{totallines}`: File's total lines

d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.details.debugging.title: Debugging
d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.details.debugging.markdownDescription:
Sets detail text when you are spraying bug spray.

 - `{lang}`: Language
 - `{filename}`: Filename
 - `{dirname}`: Directory name that has currently debugging file
 - `{fulldirpath}`: Full file path(from your root directory)
 - `{workspace[:alternativeVar]}`: Workspace name (if alternative var is set it will be used if original var is not available)
 - `{filesize}`: File size in human readable text(ex: 1.44 MB, 4.20 KB)
 - `{totallines}`: File's total lines

d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.state.idling.title: Idling
d1sc0rd-64m3-rpc.state.idling.default: Literally player is not playing this game rn: {workspace}

 - `{workspace}`: Workspace name (if the workspace is undefined this will be changed to blank)
